R

record() - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.BasicRecorder
Starts the recording of positions and motion of the device
record() - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.Recorder
Starts the player recording
Recorder - Interface in com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces
This Interface layout the default set of recorder methods and behavours that all complete implementations of a good Recorder should have.
RecorderEventSupport - Class in com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.event
This supports the Recorder implementations with manageing RecorderListeners and event calls to those RecorderListeners.
RecorderEventSupport(Object) - Constructor for class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.event.RecorderEventSupport
Creates a new RecorderEventSupport object
RecorderListener - Interface in com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces
This interface layout the method that must be provided to be a Recorder Listener, this interface must be implemented by all objects that wish to listener to recorder events.
recorderStarted(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.RecorderListener
This event is fired when the recorder starts recording motion of the haptic device
recorderStoped(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.RecorderListener
This event is fired when the recorder stops recording motion of the haptic device
recorderUpdate(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.RecorderListener
This event is fired when an update is performed on the recorder
removeHapticListener(HapticListener) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.Device
Allows a haptic listener to be removed from the device notify list
removeHapticListener(HapticListener) - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.event.HapticListenerSupport
Removes a HapticListener from the notify list for any events fired from then on
removeHapticListener(HapticListener) - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.PhantomDevice
Removes a haptic listener from the device, so the listener will not be notified of events
removePlayerListener(PlayerListener) - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.event.PlayerEventSupport
Removes a PlayerListener from the notify list for all event firing
removePlayListener(PlayerListener) - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.BasicPlayer
Removes a PlayerListener from the notify list of any events
removePlayListener(PlayerListener) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.Player
Removes a player listener from player
removeRecorderListener(RecorderListener) - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.event.RecorderEventSupport

removeRecordListener(RecorderListener) - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.BasicRecorder
Removes a RecorderListener from the notify list of any events
removeRecordListener(RecorderListener) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.Recorder
Removes a recorder listener from recorder
reset() - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.BasicPlayer
Resets the player back to the start of the loaded data
reset() - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.Player

run() - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.BasicPlayer
This method will run within a thread and control the change in location and the playback of the data loaded
run() - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.BasicRecorder
This methos will run within a thread and control the recording of the motion of the device
run() - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.PointerRelocator
